comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: NE cornet of Cumberland and Essex Streets. Remarkably relatively unchanged today. The side door has become a window. Google street view - maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Looks to be in the same good condition. Even the poles holding up the awning (which looks new) seem to be the same ones.

comment.author: 57281914@N00
comment._content:
Well found beachcomber!
As State Records NSW says, it looks ti be in a very good condition.
